item.description:
Every Tuesday Is FREE PIZZA DAY at Ardeos

FREE pizza! Buy one pizza and get the second pizza absolutely FREE with the purchase of 2 beverages.

Union Station

The original! It is here that the theme of Ardeo, and the true passion of the Cape's premier Mediterranean Taverna, was born. The largest of the three locations, the Ardeo in Union Station Plaza offers diners a stylish atmosphere in a comfortable setting. After opening in 2001, it quickly became the neighborhood restaurant where locals frequent for lunch, dinner, and takeout; the latter of which is complemented by a complete retail counter. So stop by and enjoy the original Ardeo Mediterranean Taverna!

AnÂ inexpensive night out!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Girls Just Wanna Have Fun Table!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Pizza & Drinks at Ardeos in Yarmouth at Union Station!
